nodes.text: Veerla Mere was a Twi'lek female swoop racer and course coordinator of the swoop gang Pit Screamers during the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally. Her first victory in swoop racing inspired Raossk to join the Screamers, becoming the gang's leader by 3626 BBY. Her brother Jorn was also a member of her swoop gang but was killed a year before the All Worlds Rally while practicing in a course on Onderon.
